text: @MrSneakySnicker @DCfieldteamsEA @johncurtinEA @jamiemcclaughl1 @EnvAgencySW @MariaHerlihyEA @DeTom48 @MoretonBack1 For Worcester maybe have a word with @DaveThroupEA we have our 1st incident management duty roles, mine is NFFDM National Flood Forecasting Duty Manager, but also 2nd & 3rd  roles if we arent being used for the primary role. They're called FISO's Flood Incident Support Officers
